This is what more than 385 MS students and 92 PhD students have discovered in the last five years, moving on to sought-after industry and academic placements. Open the panels below to see a selection of the companies, agencies, and universities that represented their first destinations after UIC.       destinations     Industry roles         industry    Aldea Services  ANSYS  ARCADIS  Apple  Argonne National Laboratory  Boston Consulting Group  Brooms Engineering  Burns and McDonnell  CDM Smith  Christopher B.
